data.title: The Blue Kite
data.meta_description: A ten-year ban on filmmaking was imposed on Chinese director Tian Zhuangzhuang for showing in this historical epic how the Chinese authorities increasingly tightened their grip on the population from the 1950s. A film selected by Martin Scorsese.
data.text:
A ten-year ban on filmmaking was imposed on Chinese director Tian Zhuangzhuang for showing in this historical epic how the Chinese authorities increasingly tightened their grip on the population from the 1950s. A film selected by Martin Scorsese.
